nodes.text: Zaria was a terrestrial world located in the Zaria system of the Juvex sector, a part of the Senex-Juvex region in the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. The Senex-Juvex Loop hyperlane linked it to the Anstares and Malador systems.

An industrial world, Zaria was the homeworld of the sentient, frog-like Zarian species. Although the Zarians themselves were free, their homeworld, like the rest of the Senex-Juvex worlds, was under the control of the region's aristocratic Ancient Houses.
Zaria was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-17.
